items.sentence: When Tom got home, he found his parents sitting on the porch waiting for him.
Tom and Mary have the same last name, but they aren\'t related to each other.
Home isn\'t where you live, but where you\'re with people who understand you.

Tom couldn\'t get to sleep because he had drunk too much coffee after supper.
